{"id":984195715,"question_id":2873,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1688268011,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/984195715/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Prime Pairs With Target Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<List<Integer>> findPrimePairs(int n) {\n        List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();\n        for(int i=1; i<=n/2; i+=2){\n            \n            int x = i; \n            int y = n-x;\n            if(isPrime(x) && isPrime(y)){\n                res.add(Arrays.asList(x,y));\n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n    \n    \n    \n     \n     public boolean isPrime(int n)\n    {\n        if(n<2)\n        {\n            return false;\n        }\n        for(int i=2;i<=Math.sqrt(n);i++)\n        {\n            if(n%i==0)\n            {\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"prime-pairs-with-target-sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
